name: Impossible Cube - Don't Touch Red Boxes
name_original: Impossible Cube - Don't Touch Red Boxes
description:
Impossible Cube - Don't Touch Red Boxes is amazing new game and it's almost impossible hard!

WARNING: Highly addicting!!!

Your goal is to avoid all obstacles (red boxes and wall spikes) and jump and dance all around like crazy. This is just awesome game to test your brain reflex and your finger speed. You have to make your best when you try to avoid collision with a walls and red boxes. Game is made with a real 2d geometry and physics, so it's really fun to play. Can you get your box flying?

Game is build up with a beautiful clean simple graphics and colors, with a small boxes and dangerous spikes. Easy controls gives you great gaming experience and also learning curve, in no time you'll become a master to avoid walls and red boxes.

[ GAMEPLAY ]
Funny small cube falling down when you don't tap a screen. When you tap the screen your cube jump left or right. So, you must jumping and dancing all around and trying to avoid all obstacles.
Remember you can't fall down to the floor or hit side walls or even touch on ceiling and of course you must avoid red boxes. So don't smash and break your happy and tiny cube, because this make it so unhappy.

Easy finger tap control - touch left (jump left) - touch right (jump right)

[ WHAT YOU GET ]
- amazing new game idea
- easy gameplay (tap control)
- beautiful graphics
- colorful bricks and tiles
- dangerous spikes and boxes
- fun and really addicting game
- this game makes you happy
- amazing and same time impossible game
- test your brain and finger speed
- real 2d geometry and physics
- lot of tight and crazy, but funny moments

Challenge your friends now and spend some amazing moments with your buddies, just play and enjoy! So now it's time to jump and dance all around with your happy tiny cube!
